commit.message:
Rollup merge of #70134 - hermitcore:osstrext, r=dtolnay

add basic support of OsStrExt for HermitCore

- this patch increases the compatibility to other operating systems
- in principle `ffi.rs` is derived from `src/libstd/sys/unix/ext/ffi.rs`

verification.payload:
tree b644fd2758c844ff7195dd66e96ed7134a254903
parent 485c5fb6e1bf12cd11a8fac5ee94962e17cff74b
parent c6435759b5039fa6483aa5a8775fc7a11db0154f
author Dylan DPC <dylan.dpc@gmail.com> 1586381618 +0200
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1586381618 +0200

Rollup merge of #70134 - hermitcore:osstrext, r=dtolnay

add basic support of OsStrExt for HermitCore

- this patch increases the compatibility to other operating systems
- in principle `ffi.rs` is derived from `src/libstd/sys/unix/ext/ffi.rs`

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,14 @@
+#![stable(feature = "rust1", since = "1.0.0")]
+#![allow(missing_docs)]
+
+pub mod ffi;
+
+/// A prelude for conveniently writing platform-specific code.
+///
+/// Includes all extension traits, and some important type definitions.
+#[stable(feature = "rust1", since = "1.0.0")]
+pub mod prelude {
+    #[doc(no_inline)]
+    #[stable(feature = "rust1", since = "1.0.0")]
+    pub use super::ffi::{OsStrExt, OsStringExt};
+}
